Traits.Name: Scuttle
Traits.Content: The Giant Cockroach can move along walls and ceilings without needing to make an ability check.

Traits.Name: Survivor
Traits.Content: The Giant Cockroach doesnâ€™t need to eat or drink and can survive for up to a week without sustenance.

Actions.Name: Mandible Bite
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +4 to hit, 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Swarm Tactics
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +4 to hit, 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage. If the target is within 5 feet of another Giant Cockroach, the target has disadvantage on the saving throw against being frightened until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Fleeing Scuttle
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +4 to hit, 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage. After this attack, if the Giant Cockroach is hit by an attack, it can use its reaction to move up to half its speed away from the attacker.
